The investigator hypothesize program offer mobile application may promote well-being reduce stress relate problem participant . DOC.brief_title: Flourishing App : An Evaluation With High School Students
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Some successful stress management program base principle Mindfulness . This protocol propose well-being program , deliver application mobile device , base meditation positive psychology principle human development , improvement virtue , quality life well-being . In modern world , young people connect new technology use application fun way learn cope stress promote well-being . In sense , investigator hypothesize program offer mobile application consider interesting alternative high school student want reduce symptom related stress also promote well-being . Objectives : To evaluate effectiveness well-being program deliver application mobile device sample high school student . Methods : Sixty high school student recruit . The participant randomize two group 30 participant one , half control group ( GC ) half intervention group ( GI ) . The GI participate Flourishing App Program , eight week , GC access Control App . Then , evaluation , GC receive intervention ( Flourishing App Program ) , first group repeat use Flourishing App Program . Questions apply evaluate level stress well-being participant program training period .
